Name: My Last Memories About You
About the game: About the game This short indie game, My Last Memories About You is about a husband who is fulfilling the last wish of his late wife. It is a short (approximately 30 minutes) emotional story-driven first-person exploration game, where you learn about the memories of the main character and his wife, learn about what happened, and see what was the reason behind this strange last wish... Features A short story that can be completed in one sitting. Passionate voice acting. Mainly an exploration experience with a small puzzle element. Colorful graphics. A calming, relaxing environment with a beautiful piano soundtrack. Interact with the objects in the world to reveal the backstories of the places the couple discovered, built and loved.
